tool_description: API that provides the daily value of currency and gold prices, maximum and minimum values ​​within the day, and the previous day's values.
name: Currency and Gold Prices API (in Turkish Lira)
title: Currency and Gold Prices API (in Turkish Lira)
tool_name: Currency and Gold Prices API (in Turkish Lira)

api_list.name: economy/currency/exchange-rate
api_list.description: It returns currency and gold information.  The 'code' value is obtained from the 'economy/currency/list' endpoint address. If not entered, it lists all data. The 'type' value is optional. The 'type' value can take two values: 'gold' and 'currency'.

api_list.name: economy/currency/list
api_list.description: The endpoint that returns the list of supported currencies and gold, along with their code information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-and-gold-prices-api-in-turkish-lira.p.rapidapi.com/economy/currency/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-and-gold-prices-api-in-turkish-lira.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-and-gold-prices-api-in-turkish-lira.p.rapidapi.com/economy/currency/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-and-gold-prices-api-in-turkish-lira.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
